name: indistps2ALT

stmt.origin: mpbir(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c1 ∈ 𝕌 → { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c1, universe)
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (Base ` c0)= c1
⊣ (Base ` c0)∈ 𝕌

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c1 ∈ 𝕌 → { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (Base ` c0)= c1
⊣ (Base ` c0)∈ 𝕌

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c1 ∈ 𝕌 → { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (Base ` c0)= c1

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ (Base ` c0)= c1

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ { ∅, c1 } ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ { ∅, c1 } =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:

⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ { ∅, c1 } =(TopOpen ` c0)

-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ { ∅, c1 } =(TopOpen ` c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopn, c0))

|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cpr(emptycls, c1))

comment: The indiscrete topology on a set ` A ` expressed as a topological space, using direct component assignments. Here we show how to derive the direct component assignment version ~ indistps2 from the structural version ~ indistps . (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
